name: The Lamplighter
description:
After a fierce blizzard snuffed out all the lights on the path between two towns, the Lamplighter must travel through the snowy forest to relight all the lanterns and protect the towns. Use your torch to light the way and keep yourself safe. Be careful to stay on your guard though, tales have been told about creatures lurking in the shadows after dark...

Created for Ludum Dare 51 in 72 hours with the theme "Every 10 Seconds".
